meanings.definition: A person or company that advertises.
meanings.sent1: Many advertisers use catchy jingles to grab people's attention.
meanings.sent2: Advertisers play a crucial role in marketing products to consumers.
meanings.sent3: The advertisers decided to hire a dancing elephant for their commercial.
meanings.sent4: In the world of marketing, advertisers are the artists painting with words.
meanings.sent5: The advertisers' creativity knows no bounds when it comes to selling products.

meanings.definition: Those who promote a product or service through paid communication.
meanings.sent1: Advertisers strategically place ads where they know their target audience will see them.
meanings.sent2: Successful advertisers understand the importance of brand recognition.
meanings.sent3: The advertisers' meeting turned into a brainstorming session for new ad ideas.
meanings.sent4: Like skilled storytellers, advertisers weave narratives that captivate consumers.
meanings.sent5: The advertisers' campaign was so effective that sales skyrocketed.
